description:
Learn the Photoshop Essentials for a beginners level, whilst developing good habits for your future design career and work.

Grow your knowledge on the most powerful graphic editing program in the world in an easy to follow online course. 

You will be learning employable skills every professional Photoshop artists uses daily as well as developing good habits + industry expert tips.


Project files + Live real-life examples of how to use tools in Photoshop.

You will get access to the images I use in this course as well as demonstrations of how you can be using Photoshop tools for real life projects, graphic design work, photo editing and other digital design needs.


The Instructor... Who is he?

My name is Aaron Ward and I have over 10 years+ experience in Photoshop creating a mass range of graphics. Oh...and I have a diploma in Graphic design. 

I will be teaching you the level of quality expected to work for clients such as Red Bull, Spotify, Carlsberg and more whom I have had the pleasure to work for.

Finally, you get my full attention on feedback. You are welcomed and encouraged to post your final result in the student discussion section where I will provide feedback to you.


What makes this course different Aaron?

  • You will be able to take the skills taught in this course and apply them to future design projects knowing what tools will help you.
  • All files are supplied and done for you
  • You get professional industry tips to stand out from the sea of average Photoshop users
  • Everything is clear and simple, making your learning experience enjoyable and memorable
  • Each skill taught is demonstrated in the most efficient way to enforce good design habits and work effiency
  • These skills are used everyday by professionals and will allow you to kick-start your design career rapidly to earn money money or offline


Take this course today and kick start your design career in Photoshop!
title: Photoshop Essentials: Learn to use Photoshop as a Beginner
